scenes.background: Monica leans against the desk, looking a bit stressed. Bob is pacing back and forth.
scenes.description: ‘I can't believe you aren't helping. We are all swamped here. What are we supposed to do now?’

options.text: I understand it's tough, but I really need this break. Let's find another solution.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the difficulty but stood firm on your need for rest, showing strong self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation to help.

options.text: I'll see if I can step in briefly and help, but I can't stay long.
options.analysis: You offered partial help, showcasing balanced empathy and social skills, though your motivation and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: I can't believe you can't handle this on your own. Maybe it's time to rethink your approach.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, showing lower empathy and self-regulation, and it might strain your relationship with colleagues.
